name: I Have Never
description:
A perfect game for parties where players take turns sharing something they have never done before. If you have done what someone else has not, you must take a sip of your drink. 

The player's goal is to fill in the blank.  For example: I HAVE NEVER EATEN ...  could be  I HAVE NEVER EATEN SUSHI.

The next player then must click on the bottle icon to get a new topic.

Works best on mobile.

English and Finnish languages available.
